page.title: 03WHAT DO WE WATCH
page.content: Of 200 in our survey most people watch border tv.when asked to indicate their FAVOURITE channel 148 BORDER 41 BBC1 5 BBC2 0 CHANNEL 4 126 made BBC1 their second choice,BBC2 and CHANNEL 4 dont seem as popular. OUR TOP TEN PROGRAMMES, 1,Coronation ST 2,Dallas 3,Sports 4,Young Ones 5,Brookside 6,Emmerdale farm 7,EastEnders 8,Dynasty 9,Minder 10,Miami Vice OUT OF 200 , 86 listen to Radio Cumbria 114 dont.when asked if they go to the cinema the 100 householders said; 15 regularly 72 not often 11 never go this is probably because the nearest cinema is Workington,7 miles away.
